title: The Smell of Death
image_desc: - A vintage Oldsmobile Tornado with a dark, ominous aura.
narration:
This is a story about a dealership I worked at and a car that just wouldn't let go of its past. 

-

title: A New Car, A Tragic End
content: - A client bought a brand new Oldsmobile Tornado.
- A few weeks later, he drove into the woods and took his own life.
- The car was found days later, the interior stained with blood.
image_desc: - A close-up image of a car's interior, showing bloodstains on the seats.
narration:
A customer bought a brand new Oldsmobile Tornado.  He drove it into the woods and ended his life.  The car was found days later, the interior stained with blood.

-

title: A Greedy Boss's Plan
content: - My boss saw an opportunity in the tragedy.
- He wanted to buy the car as salvage.
- He believed he could clean it up and sell it for a profit.
image_desc: - A man in a suit, looking greedy and calculating.
narration:
My boss, being the greedy man he was, saw this tragedy as an opportunity. He wanted to buy the car as salvage, believing he could clean it up and sell it for a profit.

-

title: The Smell of Death Persists
content: - The car was towed to our shop.
- The smell of death was overwhelming.
- Even after weeks of airing it out, the smell remained.
image_desc: - A car sitting in a junkyard, covered in dust and grime. The image should have a dark, ominous feel.
narration:
The car was towed to our shop, and the smell of death was overwhelming.  We pushed it outside to air it out, but even after weeks, the smell wouldn't go away.

-

title: Desperate Attempts to Clean
content: - The boss ordered the detailer to pressure wash the interior.
- They replaced the seats and carpet, but the smell remained.
image_desc: - A detailer using a pressure washer on a car's interior.
narration:
My boss tried everything. He ordered the detailer to pressure wash the interior, but that didn't work.  They even replaced the seats and carpet, but the smell was still there.

-

title: A Costly Lesson
content: - The smell was so bad that the car was eventually sent to the junkyard.
- The cost of trying to fix the car was more than the potential profit.
- My boss lost money, but he didn't learn his lesson.
image_desc: - A tow truck pulling a car away from a dealership, heading towards a junkyard.
narration:
The smell was so bad that the car was eventually sent to the junkyard.  The cost of trying to fix it was more than the potential profit.  My boss lost money, but he didn't learn his lesson.

-

title: The Smell of Death: A Lasting Impression
content: - The story shows that some things can't be cleaned away.
- The smell of death can linger, even in steel.
image_desc: - A close-up of a rusty car part, with a dark, ominous background.
narration: This story shows that some things can't be cleaned away.  The smell of death can linger, even in steel.
